articles.title: Orban Dangles Energy Deals to Sway Trump on Russia Oil Sanctions
articles.description: Viktor Orban expected a political boon and a flood of investments after Donald Trump was re-elected to the US presidency. A year later, the Hungarian prime minister is going to the White House with cap in hand.

articles.title: Typhoon barrels towards Cambodia after killing at least 193 in Philippines and Vietnam
articles.description: One of the year's deadliest storms has headed west to Cambodia and Laos after barreling through Vietnam.

articles.title: Oak Park Raiders win ANAVETS Bowl to end Dakota Lancers’ run
articles.description: The Raiders defeated the Lancers 22-17 to win their first football championship in over 10 years.

articles.title: US strikes another alleged drug boat bringing death toll from campaign in Latin America to 70

articles.title: PHOTO ESSAY: Coal miners with black lung fight Trump administration rollback of safety protections
articles.description: OAK HILL, W.Va. (AP) — Deep in the hills of West Virginia, coal mining and the dangers that come with it have been a part of families' lives for generations. Death and tragedy are woven into history, but there's also a fierce legacy of miners fighting for — and winning — protections that have benefi

articles.title: About Last Night: How many overtimes can a fan base handle?
articles.description: The Canadiens lost their second straight game in overtime, falling 4-3 to the New Jersey Devils on Thursday night.

articles.title: Deep in Trump country, coal miners with black lung say government is suffocating the ‘working man’
articles.description: OAK HILL, W.Va. (AP) — Lisa Emery loves to talk about her "boys." With each word, the respiratory therapist's face softens and shines with pride. articles.title: British grandmother flies home after 12 years on Indonesian death row
articles.description: Lindsay Sandiford, who was sentenced to death in Indonesia in 2013, was freed on humanitarian grounds.

articles.title: Girl, 8, struck and killed by SUV in Oakville; driver charged
articles.description: An 8-year-old girl is dead after being struck by a vehicle in Oakville. articles.title: HWY 1 through Burnaby closing Saturday, Sunday for pedestrian overpass construction
articles.description: A five-kilometre section of a major route through the Lower Mainland will be closed for part of the weekend, DriveBC says. articles.title: Hundreds of Vancouver city jobs could be cut under mayor’s proposed budget, unions warn
articles.description: Local unions warn hundreds of full-time jobs could be cut if the City of Vancouver's proposed 2026 budget is approved later this month.

articles.title: Gunshots ring out at B.C. ostrich farm as cull moves ahead
articles.description: Numerous gunshots have been heard at a B.C. ostrich farm where the CFIA says it is moving ahead with a cull of hundreds of the birds.
